faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: List of issues frequently encountered by our users

items.title: No downloads available, what to do?
items.description: In the top menu of the site, select Community Links and add the necessary download sources. If the problem persists, use the community server.

items.title: One of the games in my library won't launch, what to do?
items.description: You might have downloaded a faulty repack, try downloading another one. If the problem persists, use the community server.

items.title: What is this site?
items.description: This site is unofficial and serves to support the HydraLauncher community. It is not affiliated with the official developers.

items.title: For copyright holders
items.description: The site author assumes no responsibility for the HydraLauncher project or the materials posted in the 'Download' and 'Community Links' sections. The website is merely an informational resource.

download.title: Available Downloads
download.description: Select your operating system for download
